English: Doraemon's prediction
I'm home.
I'm leaving.
Magical Hand from the 2nd century
Don't play any weird tricks!
I really wanted to find you though.
You're going to Shizu-chan's, aren't you?
Yup.
She told you she gets lonely when she house-sits, right?
Sanskrit: गृहे एकान्ततः तिष्ठति इत्यतः क्रीडितुम् आहूतवती किल?

English: How did you know?
Don't go!!
It's none of your business!!
Let me show you what will happen if you go.
Sanskrit: गमिष्यसि चेत् किं भविष्यति इति दर्शयामि!

English: The album again?
1970: ran over by a dump truck.
On the way to shizu-chan's, you got run over and sustained injuries that took one month to completely heal!
Sanskrit: यदा षिज़ोः गृहे गच्छन् आसीः तदा मार्गे दुर्घाटानायां व्रणितोः जातः। उपचर्ये मासस्य एकस्य समयः जातः।

English: For starters, your already idiotic brain will get worse..
R-re..Reall..?
You'd better not do anything and stay home today.
Sanskrit: किमपि न कुरु। गृहे एव तिष्ठतु।

English: All right.
I'm sure Shizu-chan will get mad, though..
You've got a phone call from shizu-chan.
Wah, what should I do?
Let me take care of things for you. I'll just tell her you can't go.
Sanskrit: तव साहाय्यं करोमि। तव स्थाने तां वदामि यत् आगन्तुं न शक्नोषि।

English: Hello?
I'm very sorry, but..
Eh, wou..
Would you let me speak a bit?
Oh! you've got a funny new manga huh?
I see. A special home-made cake too?
I told her we'd be over there shortly.
Whaat?
Don't you even care if I get in an accident?
Sanskrit: दुर्घटना स्यात् इति चिन्ता नास्ति किम्?

English: You should always keep your promises though.
I'll walk with you.
Things will be okay if I'm with you.
Sanskrit: त्वया सह चलिष्यामि चेत् सर्वं समीचिनं भविष्यति।

English: I'd better say goodbye to my parents..
Sanskrit: गमनात् पूर्वं मातापितरौ स्व-प्रास्थानिकं वक्तुं वरम्...

English: Thank you for taking care of me all this time.
I'm very happy that you treated me so well all this time.
But today might be my last day seeing you.
Sanskrit: किन्तु भवन्तौ द्रष्टुम् अयं दिवसः अन्तिमः।

English: Stop acting so strangely...
Where are you heading off to?
Shizu-chan's
Well cut it out, you're exaggerating.
Which way should we go?
Shizu-chan's house is in this direction.
Let's be cautious.
Let's see where we'll be in a bit with TIME T.V
Sanskrit: अचिरात् कुत्र भविष्यावः इति समयदर्शिनी-द्वारा पश्यावः।

English: We'll Be over THERE IN about 10 seconds.
Run or you'll be hit by a car over there.
This is Dangerous.
I guess we'll just take a detour.
Yeah, we should be okay now.
WAAAH, you broke my car.
Sorry, I wasn't paying attention.
I guess that is like an accident.
We're still not out of danger yet, it seems.
I suppose so.
You should always look ahead when you're walking. You could run into something.
Something might come from behind too, so be careful.
Didn't I just say to look ahead? Pay attention.
Sanskrit: इदानीमेव अग्रे पश्य इति कथितं किल मया? अवधातव्यम्।

English: How can I look book ways at the same time!?
Sanskrit: समकालम् उभे दिशौ कथं द्रष्टुं शक्यते?

English: Let me take out the time t.v.
This road's really wide
We should be able to see a car if it's coming towards us.
Sanskrit: किमपि यानम् आगच्छति चेत् द्रष्टुं शक्यते।

English: Whee!
Well then let's go this way.
Careful
Follow me!
Watch out!
We can't go any further
Where can we go?
Ah!
We don't have to look for another path!
We should be safe if we go through people's houses.
Sanskrit: जनानां गृगाणां द्वारा गमिष्यावः चेत् आवां सुरिक्षितौ भविष्यावः।

English: What!?
We've got no other option.
Excuse us.
I feel like a thief!
Quit whining!
Is she practicing how to drive in her backyard?
Get out of the way?! I can't stop it!!
This backyard's small. We should be safe here.
Why're you trespassing in my backyard?
You two must be thieves!
Are you possibly a truck driver?
How'd ya know?
I knew it! It just had to be related to cars in some way!
Sanskrit: अवगतं मया। कथञ्चित् अपि यानैः सम्बन्धः भवेत्।

English: What? You were trying to get away from all the cars? Well, you've come to the wrong place.
Sanskrit: किम्? यानेभ्यः पलायसि किम्? किन्तु अनुचित-स्थले आगतवान् त्वम्।

English: Why?
We're at the bottom of a steep hill.
Dump trucks're always crashin' down here
See?
Bah! Bye!
I know!!
There's one route that'll definitely be safe!
Sanskrit: एकः मार्गः अस्ति यः निश्चयेन सुरक्षितः।

English: We should be safe if we walk on the rooftops.
Why didn't you think of this earlier?
You are so stupid.
You too.
No car can get up here.
Watch out.
I'm tired of this! Let's just go home.
It is too late. If we turn around, something bad will happen.
Sanskrit: बहु-विलम्बः जातः। पुनर्गमने अपि असाधु जनितुं शक्यते।

English: It is your fate, don't fight it.
Stop being so irresponsible.
I knew something like this would happen. I was getting worried about you two, so I came.
Sanskrit: ईदृशं भविष्यति इति पूर्वमेव ज्ञातं मया। बहु-चिन्तितः सन् आगतः अहम्।

English: Sewashi-kun.
Help us!
You're so dumb, Doraemon.
I can't let you take care of grandpa alone if you're this careless.
Sanskrit: त्वम् एतावत् अनवधानश्चेत् कथम् एकाकिने ते तातस्य पालनस्य अवसरः दीयताम्।

English: Don't call me dumb.
Don't call me Grandpa.
Why didn't you just fly him with the take-coptor.
I feel so ashamed.
It looks like we got here in one piece.
I was bored, so I asked some of the neighbouring kids to come over to play.
Sanskrit: नीरसा आसम् अत एव प्रतिवेशि-बालाः अत्र क्रीडितुम् आहूताः।

English: I'm glad.
Why are you so happy?
I'm just glad your injury's only this bad. You would've looked like this otherwise!
Sanskrit: ईयत् एव व्रणितः जातः त्वम्। नो चेत् ईदृशं दृश्यते स्यात्।
